case.state: An occasion like this deserves nothing but my best outfit, give me a second...
I'm not going to play in such a common outfit! Give me a moment while I change...
Ready for the best outfit you'll ever see? (Until I make a new line of course!)
When a lady plays a game of chance, she must do it IN STYLE!
This outfit is fancy and fresh, perfect for a fun cruise! Or a game of poker!
Elegant and classy! If I ever were to go to a royal event, this would be the perfect choice!
This is one of my older masterpieces, but you'd never know because my couture is so fashion forward!
